introduction: Web developer based in Montreal, passionate about PHP, Drupal, and Vue.js, with 3 years of experience in Back-end (PHP Symfony, Drupal) and Front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript). I have also played a key role as a Scrum Master, improving team processes and productivity in Agile environments. Currently, I am exploring React and expanding my portfolio to showcase my projects. Curious and driven by innovation, I am looking for opportunities to leverage my technical skills and experience within a dynamic team.
